channel.title: New private server enjoy 24/7 up
channel.description:
[center][b]InfinitePK is back online![/b][/center] * I'd like to sincerely apologize for the recent down time of our server, we were under DDoS attacks so we had to change servers. We were previously hosted on a VPS, and even on very basic VPS hosting we managed to maintain a high level of uptime and minimum server lag throughout attacks, so we're quite confident with our new dedicated hosting and would like to invite you once more to come join us!
The server has launched very recently today before this post, so you've got a chance to be among the top players straight away within your first couple of days played!
[center][b]Here's some Screenshots with a little info about them:[/b][/center] *
[center] [img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/5796/clientlayout.png[/img]
[b]This is the client layout[/b] * [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8035/higherlvltrainingspot.png[/img] [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/913/lowlvltrainingspot.png[/img]
[b]Heres a few training spots[/b] * [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/2603/maxstat99.png[/img]
[b]Showing max stat is 99[/b]
[img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/459/shopsu.png[/img]
[b]The main Shop[/b]
[img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/8127/workingportals.png[/img]
[b]Where the portals can take you[/b] [/center]
[center][b][center]Here's some facts about the server![/center]
[b]Server Type:[/b] [i]F2P Server![/i] [b]XP Rate:[/b] [i]25X![/i] [b]Maximum Stat:[/b] [i]99![/i]
[b]Host:[/b] [i]Dedicated hosting with great protection![/i] [b]Staff:[/b] [i]We've got great caring & friendly staff![/i] [b]Updates:[/b] [i]Frequent Updates![/i]
[i][b]Bonus: Join today and receive a temporary XP boost for the next 2-3 days! [/b][/i][/center]
We hope to see you online soon - Thanks and have fun!
InfinitePK Staff. *

item.title: New private server enjoy 24/7 up
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Don’t post virus’s on the website.

Read full topic

item.title: New private server enjoy 24/7 up
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:11, topic:362342”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=458631.msg3356707#msg3356707 date=1285970962]

/voteModeratorsWillCheckEveryTopicPostedHereBeforeItsShownToMembers

They can check it, but they won’t decompile the client and look through the whole thing…
[/quote]Well they should do some sort of checking before this gets posted. It’s only fair, and will keep RS2 out of ehre at least.[/quote]

No, they shouldn’t. That’s just extra work for them, that isn’t really justified.

If you are suspicious then make a post, or PM me, and I’ll personally check it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

[center]InfinitePK is back online![/center]
*
I’d like to sincerely apologize for the recent down time of our server, we were under DDoS attacks so we had to change servers. We were previously hosted on a VPS, and even on very basic VPS hosting we managed to maintain a high level of uptime and minimum server lag throughout attacks, so we’re quite confident with our new dedicated hosting and would like to invite you once more to come join us!

The server has launched very recently today before this post, so you’ve got a chance to be among the top players straight away within your first couple of days played!

[center]Here’s some Screenshots with a little info about them:[/center]
*

We hope to see you online soon - Thanks and have fun!

InfinitePK Staff.
